Whenever you land within 5 feet of a creature after swinging at least 10 feet on a dangling rope or chain, you gain advantage on your first attack roll against the creature this turn.

You also learn the following Gambits: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.OB8YW767NKUR0TXY]{Gambit: Weigh Anchor}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.0LCC8YZ2VZB77YR9]{Gambit: Getting Yer Sea Legs}
